long_description:
Requires a CONNECTION_FSV node at the start of the app to connect with
the instrument. The VISA address will then be listed under 'connection'.

This node should also work with compatible R&S network analyzers.
short_description: The INIT_SWEEP_FSV node starts the sweep for the FSV.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_FSV node).
